name: Tapperoo
description:
Fun and addictive educational game for kids, to help them learn and recognise alphabet and numbers, as well as enjoy learning along the way. 

There are 6 levels to get through plus an endless play game mode where the kids can tap till their hearts content.
There are NO hidden costs; NO micro transactions and best of all NO ads! 
Completely child friendly.
For ages 2 to 99+
Hours of fun and learning
Kids can:
*Learn the alphabet 
*Learn number recognition
*Learn colour recognition
*Learn Shapes
*Develop their fine motor skills 
*Learn to recognise words
Fun sounds and bright graphics will hold your child's attention, for hours of fun.
